name: Ribbonwood Retreat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I had a wonderful stay at Ribbonwood Retreat last week. The room was large and very comfortable. We received a warm welcome and a wonderful recommendation for dinner at the Blue Ice Cafe--including being picked up in a limo!
reviews.title: Great stay at Ribbonwood Retreat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 2 nights at the Ribbonwood Retreat, just outside Franz Josef. It was great. Our bedroom on the ground floor was small but perfectly adequate. The private bathroom was large and beautiful. Our rooms were closed off from the main part of the house for privacy. Jo was a perfect host, cooking us terrific breakfasts, helping us with logistics for our glacier walk, and sharing lots of interesting and fun information.
reviews.title: Lovely B&B in Franz Josef

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As soon as we arrived, Jo welcomed us with some date and walnut loaf and this typified the welcoming and homely style in which this B&B is run.
reviews.title: Nice and homely

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The B&B is only 5 minutes drive from the town centre and offers accommodation away from the more touristy areas. We stayed in the standalone cottage which is also more private.
reviews.title: A Great Retreat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Jo is very friendly and easy to talk to. He is quick to offer advice about where to eat, what to do and a story or two. He clearly know a lot about the natural environment of NZ.
reviews.title: Best stay of our entire vacation

description: Welcome to Ribbonwood B & B - a haven for nature lovers. Sleep deeply, breathing fresh clean air! Hosts Jonathan, a wildlife ranger and Julie, international school teacher are experts on history and ecology of the glacier region. We are passionate hikers and bird watchers who can show you the best places to visit.
